turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hey there, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey. I need to make an order for Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like from there?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need two large veggie pizzas with both of them having thin crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. the cost for 2 large veggie lover pizzas both with thick crust comes out to $36.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want me to place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually, is it possible to get one of the, well, both of the pizzas square cut?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, let me change that in the order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i've changed it to square cut veggie lover pizzas with thick crust. the price didn't change. did you want me to place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've placed the order. it'll be ready for pick up in 35 mins.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, that's all I needed. Thank you.
